verbs.description: [ARG1: i-69 construction lane] [V: shifts] [ARGM-PRP: to close ramps in flint] the work will take place from 9 a m to 3 p m on nov 1 the northbound and southbound interstate 75 ramps to eastbound i-69 will be closed during that time then reopen i-69 lane i 69 michigan department of transportation mi mdot flint
